properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\iox.exe" or (ProcessCommandLine contains ".exe fwd -l " or ProcessCommandLine contains ".exe fwd -r " or ProcessCommandLine contains ".exe proxy -l " or ProcessCommandLine contains ".exe proxy -r ") or ((MD5 startswith "9DB2D314DD3F704A02051EF5EA210993" or SHA1 startswith "039130337E28A6623ECF9A0A3DA7D92C5964D8DD" or SHA256 startswith "C6CF82919B809967D9D90EA73772A8AA1C1EB3BC59252D977500F64F1A0D6731") or MD5 =~ "9db2d314dd3f704a02051ef5ea210993" or SHA1 =~ "039130337e28a6623ecf9a0a3da7d92c5964d8dd" or SHA256 =~ "c6cf82919b809967d9d90ea73772a8aa1c1eb3bc59252d977500f64f1a0d6731")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the use of IOX - a tool for port forwarding and intranet proxy purposes
